name: Exploring the depths
description:
Earth is rapidly freezing. Years prior, you predicted this event would happen and made a submarine just for a situation like this. Now, it's time to use it and explore the depths in search of somewhere to live, but be careful as you are not alone down there.

------

Changelog:

Fixed issue with lighting for tiles

Fixed the game being to dark when deep enough(decimal at wrong place...)

Fixed oxygen setting going back to default on death

Scaled the play menu down(too big outside of the editor somehow)

Added new way to accelerate(Left Shift)

------

HOW TO PLAY:

Sorry, like an idiot I explained the UI but not the controls.

Mouse - Direction

Left Shift or Left Mouse Button - Accelerate(release to decelerate)

Creative designer: Southside_Phantom
